pkgmetadata.longdescription: Continuous Norming // A toolbox for calculating continuous norms for psychological tests, where the norms can be age-dependent. The norms are based Generalized Additive Models for Location, Scale, and Shape (GAMLSS) for the test scores in the normative sample. The package includes functions for model selection, reliability estimation, and calculating norms, including confidence intervals. For more details, see Timmerman et al. (2021) doi:10.1037/met0000348.
